thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: JEFREY ABRAHAM
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by JEFREY ABRAHAM

author: JEFREY ABRAHAM
title: JEFREY ABRAHAM
text: I love my prescription ski goggles from ADS Sports Eyewear. Much better than wearing goggles over my glasses. The entire order was done online without speaking to a customer service rep. I faxed the Rx from my eye doctor after ordering the Smith goggles and a few days later a great package arrived with a solid case and my new goggles with Rx insert. A few days later I was skiing in Colorado, able to see much better than I have in years, Should have ordered years ago. Great product and customer experience.
